article.headline: Elon University 73, The Citadel 59
article.story: ELON, N.C. (AP) -- Matt Nowlin led four players in double-digit scoring with 20 points to lift Elon to a 73-59 win over The Citadel on Monday night. Jackson Atoyebi added 19 points for the Phoenix (9-14, 5-6 Southern Conference), Montell Watson posted 14 and reserve Gary Marsh netted 10 points. The Phoenix shot 50 percent from the field and hit 66.7 percent from the foul line on the night. Dante Terry was the only player for the Bulldogs (4-18, 0-1) to register double-digits with 10. The Bulldogs shot 39 percent from the field.
